item.title: US-95 North at Hawthorne Truck Route
item.description: US-95 north at Hawthorne Truck Route. Merge right for the Truck Route, merge left for US-95 north towards Fallon.

item.title: End NV-359 at US-95
item.description: End NV-359 at US-95. Turn right for US-95 south to Tonopah and Las Vegas. Continue straight for US-95 north to Fallon and Reno.
